This dress is perfect for Sunday Mass! I will be wearing to parties too. It is a little funny at the waist, but over all, TOTALLY CUTE AND WORTH THE MONEY!

评论概述: So cute, stylish and great quality!
评论详情: I ordered this dress last minute for a wedding where the dress code was casual and I didn’t plan on wearing it, but it turned out to be perfect dress. I wish I got more pictures in it. It was so cute. I wanna order it in all the different colors and I received a ton of compliments, the color was great. The fabric was great. Had a nice flow to it and was comfortable.
Just as the photo shows the dress is beautiful! Thick fabric so it’s nice quality! Very stretchy but is true to size. Loved it.
This is a super cute dress not to mention comfy and stretchy. Not my favorite ever - I like other dresses by this brand better but still a solid purchase.
I've worn this dress several times now and I always get compliments on it.  Even now that I'm pregnant, it makes a cute maternity dress.
I have to other dresses with the embroidered dots on them and thought I’d love this dress but it’s shorter and overall smaller dress. The underskirt barely covers my bum.
Not a Good fabric coz of the style ...........😔

评论概述: Was not cotton, was not the color ordered
评论详情: I ordered the light pink one, got something that was a big bright pattern. The garment also was not made of cotton.
Great quality, vibrant sweet pink floral design and comfy. Can wear braless! I am typically s-xs and it fits perfectly. Read the instructions for care DO NOT DRY seriously you’ll thank me!

I’m super happy with the quality of this dress for its price point. It’s lightweight but not see through at all with the lining. The neckline is very square so you can see my bra straps but I plan to either pin them to the side of the dress or wear a strapless bra. If you have a smaller chest I feel like you could go bra less, but I have a very large chest at 180 lbs so a bra is necessary for me. With the neckline being so square it seems like it’d be very easy to wear the sleeves off the shoulder without them riding up, but I won’t be wearing them that way. I got the pink color and it does look as pictured, but there are tiny little stripes and circles in the fabric that weren’t visible in the photos. They don’t bother me though so I’m not mad about it. Overall I would recommend this dress. It’s a good price for what you get. It would make an adorable church dress or even a maternity dress. I’ll definitely be wearing this until it falls apart on me! For size reference, I bought an XL, I am 5’1 and 180 lbs and have a c section tummy and I feel like this is very flattering for my body type. I did see someone noting the elastic is really tight but I don’t have an issue with it.
Very comfortable, breathable and forgiving fabric. Wearing it in the Texas heat and it was so light and airy. Doesn’t feel cheap or like it’s going to fall apart. Great price for a nice summer dress!

On the hunt for a bridal shower dress, I ordered multiple dresses and this was the clear winner! I am 5'3" and weight around 175 lbs. Ordering the L was perfect for me, though a medium could have fit (I prefer looser fitting clothing). I didn't want to take the dress off, and it turned out beautifully in photos (even accidently matching with the theme my mom had planned)!  I will note that the sleeves can be a little tight around the arms (the main reason I didn't want to try a medium). The only thing that would make this dress more perfect would be pockets!

I’ve gotten sooo many compliments on this dress! Especially from every young girl who sees me! It’s dreamy and makes you feel like a fairy princess frolicking in the flowers! Add it to your closet asap!

I’m a style hopper and lately going for a southern goth/ghosty girl aesthetic and this dress was EXACTLY what I needed to get started! The sleeves are breathable as is the fabric. The texture is similar to linen which I love, however I know that isn’t everyone’s cup of tea. The length is perfect for me, I’m a short girl so dresses being too long is a problem for me most times. All in all this dress is absolutely lovely :)
Very cute. Quality is good for the price point. It is lined! Happy with it. Fabric is a soft cotton/linen like material, so it’s a more casual dress.
Great value, beautiful, comfortable, true to size

I bought this dress a couple years ago and granted it probably went up in price a little bit since then. However, this dress is made of very poor material. I ended up giving this dress away because the material irritated my skin. Also, one of the sleeves got completely stretched out and I couldn’t get it back to normal.

I wore this dress the first time for a brunch with my bridesmaids close to my wedding and received so many compliments. I loved the flowers on it, so cute! It is a bit see-through so I would recommend wearing some shorts under.
So comfy and gorginaaaa! Highly recommend.
This dress is very pretty and looks great and it’s very soft!

The dress was gorgeous and fit me perfectly which I wasn't expecting to be honest. I ordered a medium and wasn't sure if they'd get my size wrong but the dress fits great. I have sensitive skin and was worried about the fabric feeling itchy and irritating my skin however that wasn't an issue. If you're looking for a simple, girly, flowy dress as long as you know your measurements and look at the size guide I recommend. 🌼🫧👗

This is one of my favorite dresses, alongside the shorter version they have of this. I have this in pink and white. The pink floral is my favorite - the pink is this gorgeous blush pink, and the flowers are so cute and dainty. The white is similar - it's VERY white in person, and the flowers stick out. Neither of the dresses are sheer, and they're also lined. The dress is flattering, comfortable, the fabric isn't itchy at all, and I love the slit up the side. The fabric is also quite lightweight in my opinion, so it's a great Summer dress, and you never feel too hot or sweaty in it. The shirring in the chest area also makes it a great dress for anybody who has a big bust like me. I love it so much I plan on buying it in the other colors!
I looked like strawberry short cake. This is so cute for summer. I love it. It is slightly sheer so wear nude underwear.
I love this dress and the fit on me!

The quality of this dress was amazing, I was pleasantly surprised. The fit is adorable and extremely comfortable. It’s light but double layered on the skirt so it’s not transparent at all. It’s flowy and will make you feel like a southern bell.

Cheaply made dress, the lining underneath is way too short to actually serve any function and the outer layer is sheer so you must wear additional slip underneath. There is also an unsightly seem in the skirt right down the middle of the dress and the patterning is not dyed but printed with that plastic graphic t type substance. The color is also very very pale yellow almost looks like when white yellows with age. Not returning because the style is cute but definitely could be made better for this price. Also got the beige color and don’t recommend it, very bland looking color that would wash out most skin tones in my opinion.
This material is very rough and wrinkled. The top is very low cut, a very bad fit and or style.

I bought this to wear to a tea party vibe costume party. The dress is well made and doesn’t feel too thin, and is comfy. Their is a seam on the front skirt of the dress which is a little weird but isn’t all that noticeable in my opinion. It fits pretty well but I think I could have sized down.
Perfect for my maternity shoot
So I loved this dress but after 2 wears the elastic in one of the sleeves broke Reached out to the seller and they gave me a brand new dress and a label to return the broken one LOVE THIS DRESS!!

评论概述: The color is not as depicted; it looks faded and of poor quality.It was returned.
评论详情: Looked faded and of poor quality.

I bought this as a casual summer dress and ended up wearing it to a wedding after party. it was a great dress to dance in without being suffocated and also looking easy breezy. you can dress it up or down which makes it super versatile.  I sized down to an XS since other reviews mentioned it's stretchy and roomy. i'm 5'6 135 lbs and i usually wear a Small or sometimes a Medium.
It made me look very fat

Love everything about this dress,bought it for Disney bounding outfit for WDW next month, excited that it’s such a lightweight fabric but not see through at all. I got the gray with rosebuds, perfect to bound as Briar Rose!
I wore this dress too many times this summer, but no one ever said anything because it’s too pretty to not be worn often. I love it so much.

I love this dress! It fits so well and the sleeves are not too tight on my arms (I have broad shoulders and that is always a worry for me usually) I’m curvy, but it is so flattering. I wear a D size bra and my boyfriend couldn’t tell that I had no bra on! The scrunch material is enough and it feels more comfy for me. I personally love a dress that is shin length, but of course that will vary in your height. Added bonus: It is double layered, so no worries about ya undies (or spandex haha) showing through. Overall I’m super pleased and will be ordering more colors!
Not flattering at all, I returned it.
I had it on for my church’s anniversary. I felt very princessy lol it’s cute!

I LOVE it. First ordered in L and had to reorder in XL because elastic around arms was too tight. Also If you are taller torso part would fit better in a bigger size. For the reference I am 5’7” normally M (US 6-8) size. 34DD/E, 170lb. The fabric is cotton, very light weight. Had to order it in pink as well.

This is such a pretty dress. I wish it was a little shorter. I’m 5’5” and it does come to mid-calf as pictured. Very stretchy, also suggest sizing down.

Me gusto, la transparencia del vestido es aceptable en la parte de debajo, mas bien la parte superior se transparenta un poco (no es tanto de mi agrado), el mediofondo me gusto, pero no es un vestido super formal ya que para mi, el mediofondo es corto a nivel de la rodilla y para que tengan una referencia mido 5,7 y pedí size M, a si que ya saben, también el detalle de la tela bueno 9/10, tenia unos pequeños hilos, pero para mi no es la gran cosa en total le doy un 8.5/10

I iorned this dress for my daughter ( a gift to her) it really doesn't ness need iorning because it can be worn in the slightly wrinkled style too. One thing nice too is that it has its own built in slip

I wore this dress for Easter, its very cute. I got a lot of compliments, only thing is the sleeves would slide down over time so I kept having to readjust them.
i feel so pretty in this dress, it's pretty soft, very intricate, and good material, feel like a fairy wearing it

The fabric are okay. Not fond of it.

I order this dress as a potential baby shower dress and it is so cute!! Super comfortable and bump friendly! It does appear to wrinkle fairly easy so will definitely have to steam it for it to look more presentable but other than that I love it so much! The sleeves are puffy and can be worn off the shoulder or on! The dress itself has a slip underneath that is half the length of the fabric of the outside so it does not show panty colors...etc. I am 4'11 and 95lbs.
i like it and i can wear it both off the shoulders and on
Fit exactly as expected. Got a medium, and it still fit comfortably (with lots of stretch) in the chest. Also a perfect dress for a cottagecore outfit
I'm pretty curvy so these type of dresses don't usually suit me, but this dress was so nice and I felt very pretty in it.
Fits a little big but very pretty! Definitely a keeper. I wear an XS, 5’4 and 115ish pounds. I bought an XS.
ADORABLE

评论概述: Elastic in sleeve broke after first wash
评论详情: After the first wash of this dress, the elastic in the bottom of one of the sleeves disappeared completely! Fortunately I have some spare elastic and know how to sew, but that's pretty poor workmanship.

I used this for an engagement photo shoot and was very happy with the turn out. Very good quality and very cute. The puff sleeves are very cute as well. Can be worn normally or off the shoulder. Very cute with wedges. Such a cute spring/summer dress. One of my favorites!
It is super cute and fit my 15 year old daughter perfectly. Is is 105 and 5’3” and the small was perfect. She loves the sleeves and length, and it looks great on her.

Fit perfectly, I got a Medium, hits just below the knees on me- I’m 5’8. I recently had a baby & nursing, I was hoping this would conceal some of the pudge & big milk boobs, but the design of this dress actually accentuates them! Even so, its still really pretty and fit well. The arm elastic was not too tight. I could wear them up or off the shoulder. I could also bring the top down to nurse without stretching the material. I’m looking forward to summer to wear this!

I absolutely love this dress so much! It’s so beautiful, and makes me feel so beautiful, it’s true to size, and of course, let it air dry so it doesn’t shrink since it it’s cotton! I highly recommend!

I purchased this dress for my gender reveal and absolutely love it! Flows nicely, a little sheer towards the top but nothing terrible I am just wearing it with a nude bandeau. Very flattering- I have a large chest and bought the XL but it had more than enough room and stretched nicely so perfect for busty ladies. Perfect for pregnancy since it has so much stretch it’ll last a long time. I bought the light yellow which is VERY light yellow- almost closer to an off white/cream but it looks gorgeous and that’s what I wanted so no complaints at all.

评论概述: Love this dress!  It is very flattering, however a bit extreme :D

I bought this dress for my birthday and it is very cute. I liked that the pattern has small little hearts all over it. The dress isn’t transparent and it very comfortable.
if your looking for the perfect aesthetic picnic dress LOOK NO FURTHER. I love this dress with my heart and soul it’s adorable. It’s stretchy, comfy, and looks SO flattering
I'm top heavy and it wasn't flattering for me.

Saying the dress runs big would be an over statement but it does slow flexability between sizes I got a large and could have gotten a medium however I wasn’t swimming In The dress it was still flattering however the breast are did keep sliding up giving saggy boob look if it’s not pulled down and the sleeves where a little loose for on shoulder a little loose for off the sholder but do able the dress is a little thin it still covers but I would suggest a slip or shorts the dress on be fit to right under the knee
Got this dress in white and yellow (size small). Feel like a princess in both. 10/10 recommend!
I think this dress is absolutely adorable. Perfect for that cottage core vibe does shrink in wash so be careful.
Very pretty dress. My daughter adores it. Absolutely love it. The dress is quite photogenic.
I loved it so much, I bought another one in a different color!

评论概述: Makes me look younger in a weird creepy way
评论详情: I was on the fence about ordering the beige or pink. One of the reviews said the pink was more of a pinky-brown so I went with that, but the dress I received was pastel cotton-candy pink. I love really feminine dresses and bought this because I’m obsessed with the Hill House Home nap dresses and was looking for a more affordable alternative. However, this didn’t really measure up. The proportions were somehow not as flattering and the ruffle across the chest seemed little-girly, especially in baby pink. I’m 41 and petite and I’m usually not a fan of calling anything age-inappropriate but this totally was, at least on me. I considered exchanging for beige but with the summer winding down, I opted to just return it.
Fit well and looks good.  The colors are not very vibrant though.
Cheap material
Loved this nice summer dress. It is too soft and comfy.

I am obsessed with Bridgerton and bought this dress in homage. The dress is very cute and stretchy/flattering. I don’t have the issues others mention with the elastic cutting into my arm. Well after a few hours I might have a bit of discomfort and can adjust it an inch or two and it’s fine. Looks so cute.
I bought this dress for a trip the Georgia. It was HOT on the trip but this dress was perfect at keeping me cool and comfortable. It fit great and was very flattering!
The fabric is wrinkly, but it's very comfy and lightweight! Wish it had pockets.
The fit was absolutely perfect. I got the sizes Small but return because the color was more taupe than beige.
Wanted the pink one but it was sold out so I settled for beige. It’s a little wrinkly out the bag but it’s cute. I bought dress in size medium. I’m 5’1 and 140 pounds. Dress reaches mid calf
This dress is made from a really thin material and even though it’s lined, I still didn’t like it. The material was also very scratchy and it did not look good on.
This is the PERFECT summer dress! I wore this to my aunts baby shower and got so many compliments! Great quality and fits true to size!
The hem line is super crooked and the seam ran down the middle of the whole dress as if it was sewn on backwards lol someone messed up
Wore it for a Barbie party! So cute, fits well, looks like the photos! The fabric is pretty nice, a tiny bit sheer but not a big deal. I wear biker shorts under everything 🤷‍♀️
I loved
Perfect for summer.

I love a comfy dress that keeps me cool and cute during Southern California summers! It twirls beautifully (always a plus; I wish I’d taken a video!) and as a bustier girl (36D) that struggles to find dresses that flatter my bust without hanging limp on my waist, I really appreciate the stretch in the chest. The sleeves are just the right amount of puff that looks romantic and not like you’re wearing shoulder pads lol! My only complaint is the fabric - it’s a bit stiffer than I anticipated and you need a good iron or steamer to smooth it out, and even then I found that it wrinkles easily compared to my other dresses.

It was such a lovely dress decided to try it. Worse case I could wear it in the garden. I like it. Normal I wouldn't go up 1 size for a lighter fit but reviewers said too big. They could have been heavier in the chest than myself and that's why. Next time in doubt I will order 1 in each size and return the one that doesn't fit. I ordered my actual size it did fit more fitted in the bodice.
bought an XL and it was still way to small.  Not flattering at all.  Refunded
This dress's package arrived covered in dirt and had many strings hanging from it's seams. It is quite beautiful, but would not hold up over time.
My 16 year old daughter selected this as her birthday dress. It fits great, its soft and washes great. After washing the puckering effect of the dress becomes more prominent and is just so cute.
